LanguageData.Apparel_ShieldBelt.label: シールドベルト
LanguageData.Apparel_ShieldBelt.description: A single-person energy shield device. It will attempt to stop any rapidly-moving projectile or energy attack. It does nothing against melee attacks or shots from point-blank range. It prevents firing out the same as it prevents firing in.
LanguageData.Apparel_SmokepopBelt.label: スモークポップベルト
LanguageData.Apparel_SmokepopBelt.description: An automatic single-use defensive smokescreen. If the wearer is hit by a projectile, it will release a cloud of smoke, obscuring incoming shots and preventing turrets from locking on.
